skill.name: docs-creator
skill.description: Create and organize public documentation pages using Fumadocs. Use when building new documentation pages or organizing existing ones.
skill.summary: Create and organize public documentation pages using Fumadocs. Use when building new documentation p...
skill.author: AayushBaniya2006

security_audit.summary: Pure prompt-based skill with no executable code. Contains only documentation authoring guidance and MDX conventions. No file access, network calls, or command execution capabilities.

content.value_statement: Creating documentation pages requires understanding Fumadocs conventions for MDX files, frontmatter, and folder organization. This skill provides structured guidance to build well-organized documentation quickly.
actual_capabilities: Create new MDX documentation pages with proper frontmatter
Organize documentation folders with meta.json configuration
Apply Lucide icons to pages and sections
Use Fumadocs UI components like Callout, Tabs, and Steps
Structure nested documentation with automatic URL routing
limitations: Does not create files on disk - provides guidance only
Does not generate images or assets
Does not handle authentication or deployment

use_cases.title: Platform Documentation
use_cases.description: Build comprehensive platform documentation with structured navigation and consistent styling

use_cases.title: API Reference Pages
use_cases.description: Create organized API reference documentation with proper grouping and icons

use_cases.title: Onboarding Guides
use_cases.description: Write step-by-step onboarding guides with Callout components and numbered steps

prompt_templates.title: New Documentation Page
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a new documentation page for [topic] in src/content/docs/[folder]/[file].mdx with frontmatter for title, description, and Lucide icon

prompt_templates.title: Add Callout Component
prompt_templates.scenario: Add a warning or info callout
prompt_templates.prompt: Add a Fumadocs Callout component to [page] with type=[warning/info/tip] and message about [content]

prompt_templates.title: Organize Folder Structure
prompt_templates.prompt: Create or update meta.json in src/content/docs/[folder] to organize pages with proper order, icons, and separators

prompt_templates.title: Multi-Section Documentation
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a complete documentation section for [topic] including folder structure, index page, and nested pages with meta.json configuration

output_examples.input: Create a getting started guide for the authentication section

â€¢ src/content/docs/authentication/meta.json - Sidebar configuration with Lock icon

best_practices: Write clear descriptions under 160 characters for SEO and search results
Use consistent icon naming with proper PascalCase (e.g., Settings, not settings)
Group related pages in folders with meta.json for organized sidebar navigation
anti_patterns: Using spaces or special characters in icon names instead of proper Lucide names
Creating deeply nested folder structures without meta.json for navigation
Skipping frontmatter or using overly long titles that break UI layouts

faq.question: What is Fumadocs?
faq.answer: Fumadocs is a documentation framework for Next.js that uses MDX files with automatic routing and built-in UI components.

faq.question: Does this skill create files?
faq.answer: No, this skill provides guidance and examples. The AI will describe what to create or edit.

faq.question: What MDX components are available?
faq.answer: Standard MDX plus Fumadocs components like Callout, Tabs, Steps, Cards, and Tab (Tabs item).

faq.question: Is my data safe?
faq.answer: Yes, this skill only reads documentation conventions and does not access files, network, or credentials.

faq.question: Can I use this with other AI tools?
faq.answer: Yes, the skill works with Claude, Codex, and Claude Code for documentation tasks.

faq.question: How do I organize sidebar order?
faq.answer: Create meta.json in any docs folder to control page order, add icons, and create section separators.
